analyses.title: Sales Overview Analysis
analyses.context: To gain a comprehensive understanding of the sales figures and identify overarching trends in the transaction data.

sub_analyses.title: Total Revenue Calculation
sub_analyses.why: To understand the overall financial performance by calculating the total revenue generated from all transactions.
answers: What is the total revenue from all transactions?

sub_analyses.title: Average Spend Per Transaction
sub_analyses.why: To measure customer spending behavior by calculating the average amount spent per transaction.
answers: What is the average spend per transaction?

sub_analyses.title: Revenue by Location
sub_analyses.why: To compare the performance of different cafe branches by revenue generated.
answers: What is the revenue generated by each location?

analyses.title: Item and Quantity Analysis
analyses.context: To analyze sales composition by item and quantity, helping to identify popular products and sales volume.

sub_analyses.title: Most Sold Items
sub_analyses.why: To identify the most popular products based on the number of transactions.
answers: What are the most sold items by number of transactions?

sub_analyses.title: Total Quantity of Items Sold
sub_analyses.why: To determine the total number of units sold for each item.
answers: What is the total quantity sold for each item?

analyses.title: Payment Method Preferences
analyses.context: To explore customer payment preferences to improve transaction convenience options.

sub_analyses.title: Payment Method Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the distribution of payment methods used in the transactions.
answers: What is the distribution of transactions by payment method?

analyses.title: Temporal Sales Analysis
analyses.context: To perform a temporal analysis of sales data, identifying trends and seasonal patterns.

sub_analyses.title: Sales Over Time
sub_analyses.why: To analyze sales trends over time by observing changes in revenue.
answers: How do sales vary over time?

sub_analyses.title: Transaction Volume Over Time
sub_analyses.why: To track the volume of transactions to understand busy and slow periods.
answers: What is the volume of transactions over time?
